readable.title: 3393926562_66cc01b001
readable.content: A man in a leather jacket and striped shirt points at something off camera . A man in sunglasses , a red striped sweater , and a leather jacket smiles and points his finger . A man with dark glasses , a black jacket , and a white and red horizontally-striped shirt pointing at something while standing on a sidewalk . A man with shaggy hair and a moustache pointing down a street . The man with the red and grey shirt and glasses is pointing .
